law.text: If a fine is imposed under KRS 6.080, it may be collected by action in the Franklin Circuit Court by the Attorney General, in the name of the Commonwealth, and the proceedings shall be the same as in civil cases instituted by the Commonwealth for the collection of debt.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1999.
